snippet: How do you feel about comics and superheroes, now or when you were younger? What is your reaction to new characters who are “no longer primarily straight, white and male under their masks”?
abstract: How do you feel about comics and superheroes, now or when you were younger? What is your reaction to new characters who are “no longer primarily straight, white and male under their masks”?

headline.main: Student Question | Do We Need More Diverse Superheroes?
